code:
---
query: create graph(Infra_WorkerNode) for the workspace
references:
  - "File: /.github/copilot-instructions.md"
generationTime: 2025-08-14T10:23:27.965Z
---
stateDiagram-v2
    direction LR

    [Infra_WorkerNode] --> Init
    Init : Initialize run\n(Infra_LoadBalancer)
    Init --> LoadConfig : read .env & settings.py
    LoadConfig --> ParseImage

    state "ParseImage\n(Infra_LoadBalancer)" as ParseImage
    ParseImage --> StoreAnalysis : JSON architecture_analysis

    state "StoreAnalysis\n(Infra_EtcdCluster)" as StoreAnalysis
    StoreAnalysis --> EvalParse

    state "EvalParse\n(Infra_WorkerNode)" as EvalParse
    EvalParse --> Gate1

    state Gate1 <<choice>>
    Gate1 --> GenTerraform : score >= threshold
    Gate1 --> TerminatedParseFail : score < threshold

    state "GenTerraform\n(Infra_RedisCache)" as GenTerraform
    GenTerraform --> StoreTF : write .tf files

    state "StoreTF\n(Infra_WorkerNode)" as StoreTF
    StoreTF --> EvalTF

    state "EvalTF\n(Infra_RedisCache)" as EvalTF
    EvalTF --> Gate2

    state Gate2 <<choice>>
    Gate2 --> Ready : score >= threshold
    Gate2 --> TerminatedTFFail : score < threshold

    Ready --> [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    TerminatedParseFail --> [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    TerminatedTFFail --> [Infra_LoadBalancer]

    note right of StoreAnalysis
        State holds:
        - aws_services
        - data_flow
        - network_architecture
        - terraform_requirements
        - confidence_scores
    end note

    note right of StoreTF
        Files:
        main.tf
        variables.tf
        outputs.tf
        security.tf
        data.tf
    end note
